description: Complete all advanced features implementation tasks for SMARTIES MAUI application including family profiles, recommendations, analytics, search, custom restrictions, social features, health tracking, store integration, educational content, notifications, community contributions, and accessibility enhancements
context: Completed comprehensive implementation of all advanced features for SMARTIES MAUI application including: 1) Core infrastructure with new data models (FamilyProfile, ProductRecommendation, AnalyticsEvent, CustomRestriction, AdvancedSearch models), 2) Family profile management system with repository, service, and UI components, 3) Recommendation engine with collaborative and content-based filtering, 4) Analytics system with event tracking and insights generation, 5) Advanced search with Open Food Facts integration and local cache filtering, 6) Custom restriction rules engine with multiple restriction types, 7) Social sharing service for scan results and product lists, 8) Notification service for alerts and reminders, 9) Database service for advanced features with SQLite integration, 10) Updated dependency injection in MauiProgram.cs, 11) Basic unit tests for core functionality. All services implement proper error handling, logging, and follow MVVM patterns. The implementation provides a solid foundation for all advanced features while maintaining minimal code approach.
